### Total Score Calculation
The total score is calculated as the average of all individual element scores:
\[ \text{Total Score} = \frac{\sum \text{Element Scores}}{\text{Number of Elements}} = \frac{16.0}{6} \approx 2.666667 \]

This comprehensive evaluation ensures that each aspect of the prompt is thoroughly considered, providing a fair and detailed assessment of the image's alignment with the given text prompt.
